subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Pirates capped a 3-1 series that, for the Mets, at least served as a reminder that Lucas Duda has developed into a serviceable first baseman since Ike Davis was traded.
snippet: The Pirates capped a 3-1 series that, for the Mets, at least served as a reminder that Lucas Duda has developed into a serviceable first baseman since Ike Davis was traded.
